channel.title: Mcp on A guy with 'Ego' in his name
channel.description: Recent content in Mcp on A guy with 'Ego' in his name

item.title: MCP my HTTP-ass!
item.description: I get it. Every innovation requires a rewrite by a newer (and typically younger) generation. Containers, Blockchain, Crypto, WASM - they all could have been built on the existing tech (and, well, TLDs, lol). But hipsters gonna hip! But every now and then something truly bizarre happens. To me, that’s MCP. MC who? Model Context Protocol (MCP) is a “standard” (gone are the days of standard taking more than 5 prompts minutes to be developed).
